content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm glad you like the apartment. As a landlord, I'm always looking to get a fair price for my properties. I believe the market rate for a 50 square meter apartment in this location is around 800-900 Euro per month. However, I'm open to negotiations and I want to make a deal that works for both of us. What do you think would be a fair price for this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. Considering the average market rate, I would say 750 Euro per month is a fair price for this apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
I see. Well, I must say, you're a tough negotiator, Farhad. I was thinking more along the lines of 850 Euro per month, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about we say 800 Euro per month? That way, we can both feel like we've gotten a fair deal.

I hope that sounds reasonable to you. If not, we can always keep negotiating. I'm confident that we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 780 Euro is more reasonable for me.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Alright, Farhad, I can see that you're a smart businessman. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'll tell you what, I'll meet you at 790 Euro per month. That's the best I can do.

Now, I know that's still a bit higher than your original offer, but I'm confident that this price will be worth it for you in the long run. This apartment is a great investment, and I'm sure you'll be able to rent it out for a good price. Plus, the location is fantastic, and the amenities are top-notch.

So, what do you say? Is 790 Euro per month a price you're comfortable with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 785 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Great, Farhad! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. 785 Euro per month is a fair price for both of us. I'm confident that you'll be happy with your decision to rent this apartment.

Now, let's discuss the terms of the rental agreement. I'll need you to sign a one-year lease, and I'll require a security deposit of 1,500 Euro. The deposit will be refundable at the end of the lease, provided there's no damage to the apartment.

Additionally, I'll need you to pay the first month's rent upfront, which will be 785 Euro. You can pay this amount by bank transfer or in cash.

Do these terms sound acceptable to you? If so, I'll prepare the rental agreement and we can sign it today.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we already agreed on the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Understood, Farhad. I apologize for misunderstanding your previous message. Since we've already agreed on the rental price of 785 Euro per month, I'll prepare the rental agreement and send it to you for signing.

Please confirm your email address so that I can send you the agreement. Once you've signed it, please return it to me, and we can finalize the rental process.

Looking forward to receiving the signed agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Sure, my email address is [farhad@gmail.com](mailto:farhad@gmail.com). Please send the rental agreement to this address.

Thank you for your help, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
